A collection of casual hand-drawn game sprites for a platformer game, featuring a new set of simple acorns, mushrooms, berries, sticks and nature themed items. These items are emphasized with a very doodly, sketchy hand-drawn style, using a retro nostalgic color palette. The items are designed for characters in a game with extremely simplified chibi-style proportions, featuring larger heads, very minimalistic bodies, and almost stick-figure-like limbs. The emphasis is on making the sprites whimsically minimalistic, maintaining consistency with the game's visual theme. The nature items are depicted on a pure white background. It's VERY IMPORTANT the background is pure white and flat with NO variation NO borders and NO patterns.

Create a spritesheet with various futuristic spacecraft and space vehicles in a top-view perspective on a plain uniformly dark background. The image should include a wide variety of designs, shapes, and sizes. Each spacecraft should have a unique and colorful design, predominantly using colors such as white, orange, green, blue, and red. The designs should range from small, single-pilot ships to larger, more complex vessels. Include elements like thrusters, antennas, weapons, and windows on the ships. The overall style should be doodled and vibrant, with a slight cartoonish touch, giving each spacecraft a distinct and imaginative appearance. Arrange the ships with plenty of space between them, all pointing vertically.
